entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Users can build and publish container images for their applications without a Docker Engine #24216
    7.0.1xx
  • dotnet sdk problem with running Azure Function project in Mac M1 in Rider #24215
  • Support flowing workload dependencies through project and package dependencies #24205
    6.0.3xx
  • Make dotnet list package work without restore when using lock files #24194
  • Make dotnet list package --vulnerable take the target framework into account #24193
  • Reenable DotnetNewCommandFirstArgumentShouldBeSentToTelemetryWithPerformanceData #24190

Closed

  • "dotnet test --blame-crash" swallows first test assembly #20241
  • [Feature] Add an option to build cross-platform wrapper startup executables #12700
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24214
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Clarify NuGet version conflicts #24209
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Reapply fsharpcore update #24212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #23862
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.407 #24155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Temporarily disable test that's failing 10% #24191
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Blame switch args should not swallow following arg #23722
    Area-DotNet Test
  • reenable composite r2r singlefile test on OSX #23934
    Area-SingleFile

Updated

  • deploy common roslyn assemblies used by multiple dotnet tools #24168
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Draft: detect if a particular execution of the SDK is on a CI system or not #24166
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1643737 #23858
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update 6.0.3xx with the 6.0.200 version of files #23977
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Workload update timer #24104
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix cli translation issue in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #23882
    Area-Infrastructure
